title: 820-4924 power issue
message:
This one turns off and magsafe light goes green when you tap the power button. I have tried a good keyboard.

Any suggestions?

Thanks

title: 820-4924 power issue
message: Realy?? Thats all? no history, no measurments, no tests.....

title: 820-4924 power issue
message:
This one had liquid but board looks clean no corrosion. There is PP3v42 and KBD_ONOFF_L goes low with power button. This is a 2015 so no ASD. Is there measurements or test you would like me to run/take that would help you understand what could be the problem. The machine seems to function fine other than the power button issue.

Thanks

title: 820-4924 power issue
message: the basics, PPBUS_G3H, green/orange light, this board should turn on just by pluging in charger, so forget about power button for now, the fan will not spin untill the processor gets really hot, so forget about fan spin.. CPU Vcore present??

title: 820-4924 power issue
message: SMC reset is triggered when you hit the power button. Check corrosion around U5010 and U4850.
